title.@value: CARASIL - [cerebral autosomal recessive arteriopathy with subcortical infarcts and leukoencephalopathy] syndrome

definition.@value: CARASIL is the acronym for cerebral autosomal recessive arteriopathy with subcortical ischaemic strokes and leukoencephalopathy.

fullySpecifiedName.@value: Cerebral autosomal recessive arteriopathy with subcortical infarcts and leukoencephalopathy
